amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to prohibit changes to existing National Park air tour management plans.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit changes to existing National Park air tour management plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 236 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gosar.
